title: [Lower Back Pain - Specific or Non-Specific?].
summary: Lower Back Pain - Specific or Non-Specific? Abstract. Lower back pain is a challenge. A diagnosis that is as accurate as possible is significant for both the treating physician and the patient. With a precise examination, it is often possible to narrow â€¦
abstract: Lower Back Pain - Specific or Non-Specific? Abstract. Lower back pain is a challenge. A diagnosis that is as accurate as possible is significant for both the treating physician and the patient. With a precise examination, it is often possible to narrow down even the less specific back pain (the so-called "non-specific back pain") and assign it to a clinical syndrome.
